jobDescription: FirstLight Fiber is seeking an experienced and success-driven Carrier Account Executive interested in taking their career to new heights. This position has the flexibility to work from any of our offices or work remotely from home as long as they are within driving distance of our footprint in New England and Upstate New York. Position Summary Reporting directly to the Senior Vice President of Carrier and Wholesale Sales, this individual will be responsible for working directly with wholesale wireline and wireless customers, including but not limited to interexchange carriers, wireless carriers, internet service providers, CLECs, and MSOs. Carrier Account Executives are expected to cultivate existing and new relationships in order to develop and close new revenue opportunities on behalf of FirstLight. FirstLight, provides fiber optic data, voice, and high-speed Internet services to enterprise, carrier and wholesale customers in Upstate New York and Northern New England utilizing its own fiber optic network.
